DESCRIPTION: Affected by buffs and debuffs that affect attacks: Strength, Vulnerable, Weakened, Thorns, Lust, Pen Nib, ....
Permanently remove this card from your deck (not just this combat).
Slowed creatures take 10% more damage from attacks per card already played this turn.
You have Advantage if you have drawn any cards since the start of your turn.
You have Momentum if you have gained Dexterity this turn.
Unplayable unless you have your Titan deployed.
When drawn, play this card automatically and discard the top card from your Draw Pile.
